Canine Country Club your doggy daycare in China Grove

Welcome to the premier destination for Enrichment-Based Dog Boarding in Salisbury, NC! At our facility, we provide a one-of-a-kind experience for your furry family members. Our dedicated team is passionate about creating a safe and stimulating environment where your dogs can thrive during their stay. From interactive playtime to customized enrichment activities, we ensure that your pet receives the attention and care they deserve.

About Us

Get to know us

Welcome to Canine Country Club, where passion and expertise converge to provide a top-tier experience!

Welcome to Canine Country Club where passion meets expertise

At Canine Country Club, we prioritize enrichment, treat your pets like family, employ passionate and knowledgeable staff, and ensure a worry-free experience. Join us in creating joyful memories for your beloved companions!

Our Team

Haley Good

Meet Haley, our dedicated psychology major with a lifelong love for dogs. With a rich background in canine care, she ensures your pets receive the utmost attention and enrichment.

Ron Head

Backing her is Ron, a business management graduate and Haley's right-hand man. With a wealth of experience, Ron plays a pivotal role in customer service, ensuring a seamless experience for you and your furry friends.
